import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' const Header = () => { const [themeColor, setThemeColor] = useState({ color: "#dc3545" }) const applyColorTheme = (e) => { setThemeColor({ color: e.target.style.backgroundColor }) // document.querySelector(':root').style.setProperty('--bs-danger', e.target.style.backgroundColor) } useEffect(() => { document.querySelector(':root').style.setProperty('--bs-danger', themeColor) }, [themeColor]) return ( <>

) } export default Header
